application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Erection of rear dormer window and installation of two rear and two front roof lights to roof slopes
decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-9f750e13-7fff-8de4-85db-4a6437d48920"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The roof lights shown in drawing 133 D 08B shall be flushed with the roof slopes. Detailed drawings/full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before the relevant work commences. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-9f750e13-7fff-8de4-85db-4a6437d48920"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-fde0743f-7fff-463c-2643-8afffd356235"><span style="font-size: 14px;">Full details of design,</span> <span style="font-size: 14px;">type</span>, <span style="font-size: 14px;">section through</span> <span style="font-size: 14px;">and its </span></span></span></span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; white-space: pre-wrap;">relationship with the roof slopes.</span><br></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-9f750e13-7fff-8de4-85db-4a6437d48920"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><b style="font-weight:normal;" id="docs-internal-guid-fde0743f-7fff-463c-2643-8afffd356235"><br></b></span></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Reason: To reduce the visual impact to the streetscene </span></p><p><span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"></span></span><br></p>
